title: 【深夜福利】来一发MC主题磁性女声
author: Roko77
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Roko77 于 2016-11-4 03:18 编辑 

Cube Land 
专辑：Cube Land歌手Laura Shigihara


歌曲链接：http://music.163.com/#/m/song?id=3019650&userid=322965213


I'm in a cube land我身处方块世界I dig with cold hands我用冰冷的手挖掘I use these tools to try and climb out of this mess I've made我使用这些工具，试图从我造就的一团乱麻中脱身My door is open我的大门敞开Skeletons and zombies骷髅和僵尸
I am broken, as they walk all over me当他们从我身上踩过时，我受伤了
But if I keep on building walls, maybe they'll stay away但是如果我一直筑墙，说不定能挡住他们Think fast, it's got to last if you're gonna make it through the rest of the day快速思考，必须这么做来撑过这一天I'm trapped, I can't go back, I've made the choice to stay我被困住了，无法回头，我已决定留下来And we'll fight... keep defending through the night我们将会战斗...防备一整晚(we'll fight the good fight)（我们要打个漂亮仗）
Live... we're all driven to survive生存...我们被迫求生(we'll fight the good fight)（我们要打个漂亮仗）I'll keep going, just stay by my side.我将继续坚持，请留在我身边

感觉此生无悔入麦块。

SaveSave

replies.txt_content:

楼主可以听听看
